page.title: 05OUR SCHOOL
page.content: {OUR SCHOOL by Class 2 } We go to Hartshorne Primary (Church of England) School. There are 76 children in the school, and three classes, but there used to be four. We have{two}teachers in our class. We start each day with assembly where we sing hymns, listen to stories and pray to God. We do projects which can be talking about things back in the very olden days. We get house points if we do our work well. At lunch time we can do gymnastics, football, netball, choir, recorder or computer club. In the summer we have Area Sports. Sometimes we go on trips to places; this year we went to Weston Park, and we regularly go to the Field Study Centre. A group of us went to Hartington Youth Hostel with the teachers for a weekend. Every year we have our photographs taken.
